data.title: The REEF Mactan Residences
data.meta_description: We are pleased to present to you our project THE REEF RESIDENCES MACTAN. We boast of a luxury condominium fronting the sea. Residential Units - The Reef
data.text:
We are pleased to present to you our project THE REEF RESIDENCES MACTAN. We boast of a luxury condominium fronting the sea.

Residential Units – The Reef

14th,15th, 18th 21st floor Studio : 45sqm. – 73sqm SEAVIEW

Php 11,500,000 – 16,000,000

1BR: 65sqm plus 16sqm balcony Php 18,000,000.00

1Bedroom: 65sqm plus 18sqm balcony Php: 20,216,000.00

Reservation : Php 50,000.00

Down payment : 30% ( Outright Downpayment less reservation fee)

Balance: 70% cash upon turnover or Bank

Misc fee: 4.5%

REEF is the flagship project of Land Caster, envisioned to be a lifestyle home, something never before done in Cebu. It is a 22-storey beachfront luxury condo, which offers first-class amenities, and total luxury lifestyle living. All units will have glass walls, glass railings, and glass sliding doors facing the sea (east). Ample balconies are provided to every unit to extend the living space outdoors. A full range of aqua sports facilities (jet ski, speed boats, wakeboarding, kayak, hobby cat sail, water playgrounds, etc.) will be offered as basic features. An award-winning restaurant/ café will be operating in the lobby. Abaca Group is renowned to be one of the best restaurants in the country and even Asia. They will operate a boutique hotel with function rooms, a gym, a spa, and a sky lounge bar. The pool will be a huge infinity type overlooking the sea. Homeowners have the option of buying their watercraft and they can buy a parking slot downstairs. There will be a lounge area on the boardwalk that directly connects to the beachfront/sea.

The Developer

Land Caster Estates belongs to the group of companies under EXELAND/ NEXLAND Estates. It includes Land Resources (Mindanao) and Questhomes. Inc . with 20 years of experience in developing subdivisions and condominiums. We are one of the pioneer condominium developers in Cebu, dating back to as early as 1996. We have built a reputation for quality, reliability and good customer service. The Board of directors composed of Allan Lua, Harley Yunam, Jerry Sun, Michael Jo, Perry Lim and Gabriel Alonzo. The Board’s core business extends to a varied field including manufacturing, export/ import, agricultural, real estate, construction and retailing.

A Landmark Collaboration

Of worthy mention is The Reef’s phenomenal design team, comprised of the Philippines’ most renowned architects and designers: the partnership of Budji Layug + Royal Pineda, hailed as the country’s preeminent architectural and interior design firm, with the input of world-famous designer Kenneth Cobonpue, whose unmistakable touch can be seen in many details of the project.

In a breathtaking and unprecedented collaboration, these three design titans have created a landmark structure that is an expression of their technical and artistic talents. Because of this rare synergism, The Reef is a historic masterpiece that is a prestigious testament to its owners’ excellent level of taste.

An Elite Partnership

On its first few floors, The Reef is a luxury boutique hotel run by the award-winning Abaca Group. Abaca’s superb track record is proven by its international accolades, being excellently reviewed by many famous magazines and awarded high ratings by the world’s most prestigious travel authorities.

Special Brands

On top of these, we are using Belgian glass company Raynaer for all our windows. They are one of the biggest and best aluminum glass suppliers to many landmark buildings all over theworld. We are their only client in the Philippines. We are using high-end Mitsubishi elevators for all our lifts, and Bandouin brand generators for a smooth 24/7 quiet and efficient power operations. This brand is very famous being used in most of the super yachts of the world. And the list goes on and on. We have spared no expense to make this a project that we will all be proud of.
